query:
SELECT 
  c.name as category_name,
  COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.status = 'published'
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY c.id;
command:
